page.title: 16MOBILE SALESMEN
page.content:
The village is viisted by the following mobile vans:- {Fish & chip } -Saturday evening {Walls' ice cream} -Thursday evening {Broomfield(butcher)}-Wednesday {Babb(butcher)} -Saturday {Baker} -Tuesday&Saturday {Vanstone(greengrocer)}-Monday {Singh(draper)} -Wednesday {Daniel(papers) } -Daily
{Library van } -The Devon County Library service mobile van visits the village. It stops at the school, the Crescent, Week crossroads and Berry Cross every fortnight and Follands and Week Penrose every month.
